lead.tagline: Experience more with a Samsung Galaxy Note

products.tagline: The pen is mightier than the finger
attributes: Enjoy sharp and vivid viewing at an ultra-high resolution
Use an attractive and customisable magazine-like layout
Multitask with enhanced Multi Window on a large 10" screen
Do more on the go thanks to sleek and portable design
See it all on a stunning 5.7" Quad HD Super AMOLED display
Capture every detail perfectly with advanced front and rear cameras
Charge faster and use Ultra Power Saving mode to last longer
Write and draw more naturally and precisely using the latest S Pen
